snippet: Published in an English-language version of its online jihadist propaganda magazine, the interview is believed to be the first time the group has said anything concerning the whereabouts of Hayat Boumeddiene.
abstract: Islamic State militant group says Hayat Boumeddiene, woman suspected of taking part in Paris terror attacks, is living among its followers in Syria or Iraq.
lead_paragraph: Published in an English-language version of its online jihadist propaganda magazine, the interview is believed to be the first time the group has said anything concerning the whereabouts of Hayat Boumeddiene.

headline.main: ISIS Releases Interview With Woman Linked to Amedy Coulibaly
headline.print_headline: ISIS Releases Interview With Woman Who Fled France

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
